headline: 1 undervalued stock to buy & 1 AI laggard to avoid
summary: Aptus Capital Advisors' head of equity and portfolio manager, David Wagner, joins this episode of Good Buy or Goodbye with Market Domination host Josh Lipton to share three reasons to invest in one of his top stock picks: Progressive (PGR). Conversely, Wagner also offers three reasons to stay clear of the stock he doesn't recommend: Intel (INTC). To watch more expert insights and analysis on the latest market action, check out more Market Domination.
